umbrella.translation[0].definitions[0].d: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth
umbrella.translation[0].definitions[0].e: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
umbrella.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the protection given by a powerful country, army, a weapons system etc
umbrella.translation[0].definitions[1].e: the American nuclear umbrella over western Europe
umbrella.translation[1].definitions[0].d: something which covers or includes a wide range of different parts
umbrella.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The international organization pulls together a huge number of companies under the umbrella of the parent group.
